Хорошая игра с огромным кол-вом мутантов постоянно жаждущих убить всю команду в которой вы играете, ставте сложность по сложнее и будет вам веселье. В игре много различных монстров. Так же много и персонажей, которых нам предоставляют, все отличаются навыками и владением различного оружия. Игра отличная. Но она становится интересной лишь на сложной сложности!

ความสนุกของเกมมนี้คือ โหมด CO-OP ครับ

แนะนำเลยว่าหาเพื่อนสัก 4-5 คน เล่นด้วยกันนี้สนุกมาก

เนื้อเรื่องนี้ง่ายๆครับ คุณคือผู้รอดชีวิตจากการแพร่ระบาดของไวรัสและต้องเอาตัวรอดด้วยการต่่อสู้กับผู้ติดเชื้อที่จะมาเป็น เวฟๆ (รอบ)

มีแผนที่มากมายให้เล่นครับ แต่ถ้าเล่นหมด หรือเบื่อแผนที่เก่าแล้วก็สามารถหาโหลดแผนที่เพิ่มได้จาก Steam Work Shop 

อนึ่ง การสร้างห้องเองนั้นอาจยุ่งยากซะหน่อยนะครับ คือ ต้องทำการ ForwardPort ครับ สามารถอ่านวิธีทำได้จาก Google ครับ

อสอง เล่นเถอะแล้วคุณจะไม่เสียใจ นี่คือ หนึ่งในเกม CO-OP ที่สนุกที่สุดครับ

อสาม ถ้าต้องการจะซื้อแนะนำรอช่วงเทศกาลตอนเกมลดดีกว่านะครับ ลดสูงสุด 75%

อสี่ ลืมบอก +_+ สามารถซื้ออาวุธได้ระหว่างรอเวฟต่อไปนะครับ มีระบบเลเวล และ สายอาชีพด้วย (เวลตันที่ เลเวล 6)

I would recommend this game to anyone who enjoys fps survival horror games, and a large modbase. This game will last you a very long while what with all the maps, creatures, guns and etc. the modding community has and will come to make. It is a very enjoyable game overall and there are no flaws that I can see with it as it is now.

The gameplay is addicting and the feel of the guns is very satisfying. However, as you level up your perks the game can begin to feel stale and slow. Luckily the devs spice things up by changing skins and adding new achievements for different times of the year (Twisted Christmas, Hillbilly Horror, etc.). It'll be quite a challenge to get all the achievements, but at this point honestly it's the only reason I'm playing.

Killing Floor is a freat game that blends FPS with Survival horror and adds a different classes to level up, this makes for a great game that is fun to play for hours. So go and pick up a copy and get to the trader!

Killing Floor - совместное выживание в разнообразных уголках континента, пораженного мутационным вирусом. 
Одна из лучших игр в жанре ''cooperative horror survival''.
В игре весь геймплей продуман до мельчайших деталей и игра за каждый класс - заставляет мыслить по разному, подстраиваясь под него.
Множество разных локаций ( где каждая со своей историей и атмосферой ), а также разнообразных видов мутантов, тактика по уничтожению которых - у каждого класса своя.
Очень радуют и выделяют игру на фоне других - эффект ''Bullet time'' во время уничтожения мутантов и система классовых уровней.

You look for a good slaying game with pure on gore and awesome blood splatter and explosions? This is the game for you. People on here are relatively easy-going and I haven't really run into anyone too rude here during my time span playing this game. 

Honestly, what's not to love about killing hordes of mutants with friends? 

It's also beneficial to bring friends because the more people in a room, the more mutant numbers increase. The more, the merrier, one might say. 

I completely recommend this game.

I bought this game on a whim to tell the truth. It was on sale, part of a pacakge come to think of it, and I initially didn't hold too much hope for it. 

Glad to have been proven so wrong.

If you like shooting things either with or without people, this is a game that's right up you alley. Plus, as an additional bonus for us Americans, it's all created by a bunch of Brits. So in between the chaos of rounds 1 through 10, we get to hear the literal version of: "Keep Calm - And Speak With A British Accent."

When I'm bored, I pick a random game off my list and review it. This time it's Killing Floor and it's pretty awesome.
FPS: Check
Horror: Check
Makes you feel like a badass while you wet your little baby diapers: Check

In short Killing Floor is a waved base shooter, where you pick a class and try to survive through waves of grotesque monsters with up to 5 of your closest friends/complete asshole strangers. It has a level up system for each class, giving you a reason to keep playing the next wave. It's great for hopping on to play a few rounds, or all night long game sessions with your friends, giving you a starting amount of cash. The amount of cash and the health of enemies changes depending on the number of players in game, so playing solo is also an option for you lone wolf types. 

Pros: Fun, great gameplay, ton of fun with friends

Cons: Slightly outdated graphics, small community, you need to go buy a new pack of diapers everytime there's a siren round
Good fun game with solid combat system and graphics

Dawno temu podczas darmowego weekendu w Killing Floor będąc totalnym nowicjuszem na Steam postanowiłem wypróbować owy tytuł. Bo przecież survival horror z mutantami ( klonami) nie może być zły. Potem po jakiś 11 godzinach zdecydowałem się na zakup akurat było po 3,74 euro. I powiem szczerze od tego czasu nie żałuję ani godziny spędzonej w tej grze. Ale przejdźmy od sedna. Akcja gry toczy się w Anglii spustoszonej poprzez ataki zedów. Naszą rolą jest oczywiście eksterminacja piekielnego miotu w czasie 11 fal  ( 9 rodzajów oponentów )  zaczynając  od skrzepa ( mięso armatnie ) na potężnym "Ojcu". Niewątpliwym plusem gry jest świetny podkład który towarzyszy przy rzezi (drum n bass oraz metal ), możliwość personalizacji postaci poprzez wybór wielu skórek postaci ( niektóre są darmowe - wykonywanie osiągnięć, reszta zaś dostępna w formie płatnych DLC ), ogromny arsenał broni zaczynając na nożu a kończąć na futurystycznych giwerach, klimatyczne mapy oraz przede wszystkim poczucie zaszczucia albo po prostu emocje związane z bycia ostatnim żyjącym. Warto dodać iż posiada ona aż 252 osiągnięcia dla głodnych wyzwań a także sprawny i sympatyczny warsztat ( miejsce w którym dodaje się mapy, skiny ). W grę możemy grać samemu bądź do maks 6 osób. Wymagania sprzętowe nie są zbyt wysokie, grafika możliwe, że nie daje rady dzisiejszym produkcjom lecz uwierzcie. Tu jest ona najmniej ważnym elementem. W sumie do minusów można też dodać dosyć specyficzne community (sporo jest frustratów ). W sumie jeżeli przebędziecie te ew. dwa minusy czyli grafika i społeczność ( powtarzam iż nie wszyscy ) to spędzicie naprawdę wiele miodnych godzin w tej cudnej grze. Polecam !

Absolutely astonishing. This game brings teamwork survival to the next level. If you enjoy playing cooperatively whilst destroying waves of zombies; this is the game for you. The way the perk system is set up quite nice. Shame that it only goes to level 6, but it does take quite a bit of time, but the time is worth it. So what are you doing? Download and play this game.

Amazing game when it first came out, slightly unbalanced within the classes probably resulted in its poor metacritic score. Since then, many balances were made and it is a smooth clean game now.

However, over the years, its been pelted with skin DLCs and weapon DLCs which adds no real content to the game. As someone who has supported this project since before release I'm a bit dissatisfied with what the game has become, but it still provides an enjoyable gameplay experience for those who want a co-op zombie experience that is not L4D2.

8.5/10

Killing Floor é um ótimo game para se jogar sozinho, mas um incrível game para se jogar online. A jogabilidade é boa e simples, a trilha sonora não é nada de incrível, mas é boa. o jogo não tem campanha, então não tem história nem personagens para se avaliar. A movimentação dos personagens é boa e a física é mentirosa, porém combina com esse tipo de game

Agora falando dos pontos negativos, os gráficos se comparam a Half-Life 2, que é de 2004, ou seja, para um game de 2009, são ruins, porém, não há serrilhados, delay de renderização, erros nem nada do tipo, e os gráficos, por mais que sejam simples, são bem feitos

Gráficos: 6
Jogabilidade: 10
Trilha Sonora: 8
Inimigos: 10
Armas: 10
Física: 9

Nota final: 8,8

The game itself feels like a simplistic FPS at first, but after a while, you start thinking in terms of enemy prioritization and realizing that it isn't just guns that'll carry you through a wave. But just when you think you've had enough, you realize there are hundreds upon hundreds (dare I say thousands upon thousands?) of player-created maps. If that wasn't enough, there's a class system for all my fellow completionists out there.

The Short: Get it if you want an old school FPS that's co-op based. Old game engine, no story really to care of, good gun mechanics, hard learning curve relative to modern FPS's (COD MW, Battlefield); balanced game play, rewards skill over earned perks/guns.
 
The Long:
It's kind of weird to have a game with really a rubbish, tissue thin premise and graphics from a decade ealier to have anything really to offer in this COD MW era of FPS.  On a whim and a steam sale, I bought KF just for kicks.
By the looks of it I have the guns, the companions and a dumb AI to deal with, this should be a cake walk for an hour or so, and then I'm back to Far Cry 3/BD...well, Far Cry is crying in its lonely corner with Michael Biehn for a while now.... What KF lacks in graphic polish and writing, it has in game balance, this is  where the classes are complimentary towards each other, every shot counts when things get thick and there are no gun/bomb/airstrike/gunship to save you. If you're not playing to the strengths of your class, your team mates will and do yell viciously at you. The real satisfaction is when you play with a good team and beating up the baddies :3
Even if you find that it's getting easy to survive then just crank up to Hell on Earth, and you'll find out how old school FPS Killing Floor will drag down your ego. There also is a huge modding community given KF's relative small player pool against the likes of COD and Battlefield. I did play the Halos, COD MW 1+2+BO and BF 2 for extensive amounts of time on Xbox, but this is a good alternative and reminds me of my Unreal 2/UT days :3

This is somewhat of a challenging game. But it's a fantastic game. First time I heard of Tripwire Interactive and I've been a fan of their games such as Rising Storm. 

{} Great graphics and engine.
   {} TONS of guns and HUNDREDS of mods constantly being made for this game to this very day.
     {} Great fun when playing with friends.
       {} The zeds and slow-mo is somewhat unique and give's the game a nice feeling.
         {} Just like the guns, there are hundreds of maps (if you include the mods, but still many maps alone) for the game.
           {} The events are fun and the game is still updated.
             {} Plenty of characters to choose from as well. Including 6 different classes.

В меру динамичный, в меру мрачный, в меру обособленный от ААА-игр, Killing Floor -- это крепко сбитая игрушка про то, как весело отстреливать чудищ-мутантов в компании с друзьями.

Разработчикам, по всей видимости, удалось нащупать формулу геймплея хорошего кооперативного шутера -- стабильный онлайн даже через пять лет после релиза веское тому доказательство. Единственное, от чего страдает игра -- так это от отсутствия единой концепции, как в Left 4 Dead. Ни намёка на зародыш сюжета нет, игроки в разномастных костюмах выглядят несуразно, монстры хороши, но в них нет общей идеи, а во время ивентов упыри в праздничных колпаках смотрятся просто нелепо. Нет, я не говорю, что игра плохая, всё же в целом это классный, смачный кооперативный FPS, один из лучших в своём жанре.
